name: A Short Journey
description:
Another short Twine game I made about a week ago. Wrote this in about an hour/an hour and a half to see if I could make a short, weird IF in that time.

Not really sure how to describe the story except by saying it's fairly abstract meta-fiction with multiple endings.

Font in logo by Vivian Vong. Found at: http://www.hipsthetic.com/virus_01-free-glitch-font/
